description:
Nowadays ，with the development of high technology, more and more big companies like to choose video interviewing as a method for recruitment. This kind of interview lowered the cost and save time.

随着科技的不断发展，网络视频面试已经成为当今社会越来越多企业的选择。不仅节约成本还节约时间。

Here are some key points about video interviewing that every interviewer should keep in their mind during the process.

下面就给大家介绍一些视频面试的注意事项，每位面试官都应该在视频面试的过程中加以关注。

1. Environment and atmosphere

1. 面试环境和气氛

To drop the paintings on the wall and the other stuff that is not related to the topic. Make the surroundings suitable for the interviewing. Make sure that your noisy roommates are not around; no one will disturb you during interview.

把墙上无关的海报都摘下来，桌子上和面试无关的东西也收拾放置好。保证面试环境的安静，不要有嘈杂的声音出现。

2.prepared answers

2. 提前预演面试回答

The candidates should have a clue of the questions that interviewers are likely to ask. List the questions out and rehearse the possible and reasonable answers.  With a prepared answer, the candidates will not be that stressed out during the interviewing process. On the other hand, they would give you a bonus for your preparation.

面试者应该对面试官要问的问题有一个大概的估计。把可能问到的问题列表，再给出相应的解答。这样不仅减少了面试时的紧张感，面试官还会认为你是有认真准备，提分项哦。

3Behave yourself.

3. 举止妥帖。

On the one hand,In an in-person interview，no cheatings are allowed. Don’t hide anybody in the corner to give tips. On the other hand, dress yourself neatly.

视频面试的场合，从来不允许有作弊的现场。所以，面试的时候不要有旁人在镜头以外的地方默默提点。另一方面，着装要整洁干练。

4.Tech issues

4. 技术问题

Check out first about the computer and connection. Make sure that the interview would not be disturbed by technological reasons.

面试开始时，先测试电脑和网络连接。确保面试过程不会因为技术问题影响。
